hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying: He then mentioned the rest of the tradition to the same effect as mentioned by Sufyan

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ قُتِلَ فِي عِمِّيَّاءَ بَيْنَ قَوْمٍ
chapter.eng-name: One Who Is Killed In A Fight Among People And His Killer Is Not Known
